id: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm_TrangBiDonVi

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    dv.ten_don_vi,
    COUNT(tbm.id) AS so_luong_thiet_bi
FROM 
    e_thiet_bi_mang tbm
JOIN 
    don_vi dv ON tbm.don_vi_id = dv.id
WHERE 
    1=1
    {{ TreeSelectDonVi_.selectedOptionValue 
        ? `AND dv.id = ${TreeSelectDonVi_.selectedOptionValue}` 
        : '' 
    }}
GROUP BY 
    dv.ten_don_vi
ORDER BY 
    so_luong_thiet_bi DESC;

unpublishedAction.name: TrangBiDonVi
unpublishedAction.pageId: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm
